title: BEYOND STUTTERING: THE MCGUIRE PROGRAMME FOR GETTING GOOD AT THE
description: Author: Dave McGuire Edition: Mering ed. edition Publication Date: April 1, 2015 Publisher: Souvenir Press ISBN-10: 0285642847 ISBN-13: 978-0285642843 Pages: 192 pages Format: epub Size: 857K --- Combining mental strategies with breathing techniques, this book explains the McGuire Program, a proven technique for long-term improvement in speech and self-confidence for those who suffer from stuttering. Developed through the author’s own struggles, readers learn to alter breathing patterns while incorporating mental strategies to maintain fluent speech. This complete program quickly and dramatically improves verbal fluency while the sufferer gains self-esteem from learning to control the physical and mental aspects of dysfunctional breathing. This second edition has been revised to incorporate the development of the methods of the McGuire Program and updated to include the inspirational stories of graduates of the McGuire Program. --- http://dlfeb.com/book/beyond-stuttering-mcguire-programme-for-getting-good-at-sport-of-speaking/
